room_title: Escape room "The Haunted House" by Escape Frenzy in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Staff is always very friendly and helpful when needed. Haunted House is my favorite room so far (and we do a lot of rooms!). CSI is also good, Atlantis is good but we had 8 people which was too many to keep everyone busy. Can't wait for new rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Haunted House" by Escape Frenzy in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: I just completed my first escape room with seasoned friends and we LOVED it! The haunted room was fantastic, and the staff was fabulous. We will definitely be back for the remaining rooms. Thank you for a great night!

room_title: Escape room "The Haunted House" by Escape Frenzy in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: We did the haunted house room and it was AMAZING! Not scary just creepy! 6 of us were able to get out with 4 minutes to spare! Hints are readily available!We will come back!

room_title: Escape room "The Haunted House" by Escape Frenzy in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: We went tonight as a family. Our kids are ages 11, 13, and 17 and we all had a great time. We did not finish in time but got super close! We did the haunted house and it was a real challenge. The kids had fun and were able to solve things that even my husband and I didn't figure out.

room_title: Escape room "The Haunted House" by Escape Frenzy in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: A group of 4, we tried to escape the "Haunted House" earlier on Sunday! Oh you guys, you need to try this, it's great fun.Very clean facility, very helpful and kind staff!Thank you Frenzy, we had a great time and we will be back, brace yourselves!
